Package com.example.softwaresolutionssquad.controllers

Class DateFilterController

java.lang.Object
com.example.softwaresolutionssquad.controllers.DateFilterController
public class DateFilterController extends Object
Controller for filtering inventory items by date range.

  • Constructor Details

    • DateFilterController

      public DateFilterController(android.content.Context context, android.widget.LinearLayout dateFilterLayout, android.widget.TextView estimatedValue, android.widget.EditText startDateEditText, android.widget.EditText endDateEditText, android.widget.TextView dateFilterButton, android.widget.TextView keywordFilterButton, android.widget.TextView makeFilterButton, android.widget.TextView tagFilterButton, android.widget.LinearLayout keywordFilterLayout, android.widget.LinearLayout makeFilterLayout, android.widget.LinearLayout tagFilterLayout, InventoryListAdapter inventoryListAdapter, android.widget.ListView inventoryListView, ArrayList<InventoryItem> inventoryItems, android.widget.Spinner spinnerOrder, android.widget.ImageView sortOrderIcon, SortController sortController)
      Constructs a new DateFilterController.
      Parameters:
      context - the current context
      dateFilterLayout - layout containing date filter controls
      startDateEditText - text field for start date input
      endDateEditText - text field for end date input
      dateFilterButton - button to apply date filter
      keywordFilterButton - button to apply keyword filter
      makeFilterButton - button to apply make filter
      tagFilterButton - button to apply tag filter
      keywordFilterLayout - layout containing keyword filter controls
      makeFilterLayout - layout containing make filter controls
      tagFilterLayout - layout containing tag filter controls
      inventoryListAdapter - adapter for the inventory list
      inventoryListView - view representing the list of inventory items
      inventoryItems - list of all inventory items

  • Method Details

    • initializeDateFilter

      public void initializeDateFilter()
      Initializes date filter by setting up listeners for date input fields and buttons.

    • toggleFilters

      public void toggleFilters()
      Toggles visibility of filter layouts and resets filter conditions.

    • showDatePicker

      public void showDatePicker(android.widget.EditText selectedDateEditText, android.widget.EditText otherDateEditText, boolean isStartDate)
      Displays date picker dialog and updates date fields accordingly.
      Parameters:
      selectedDateEditText - the EditText to update with the selected date
      otherDateEditText - the other date EditText that is not being updated
      isStartDate - flag to indicate if the start date is being set

    • updateDateFilter

      public void updateDateFilter(android.widget.EditText startDateEditText, android.widget.EditText endDateEditText)
      Updates the list based on the selected date range.
      Parameters:
      startDateEditText - the EditText containing the start date
      endDateEditText - the EditText containing the end date

    • convertStringToDate

      public Date convertStringToDate(String dateString)
      Helper method to convert a date string to a Date object.
      Parameters:
      dateString - the date string to convert
      Returns:
      the Date object

    • displayFilteredResults

      public void displayFilteredResults(Predicate<InventoryItem> condition)
      Filters the inventory list based on the provided condition and updates the ListView.
      Parameters:
      condition - the condition to filter the list

    • setButtonActiveBackground

      public void setButtonActiveBackground(android.widget.TextView button)
      Helper method to set the background of a button to indicate it is active.
      Parameters:
      button - the button to update

    • resetButtonBackground

      public void resetButtonBackground(android.widget.TextView button)
      Helper method to reset the background of a button to the default state.
      Parameters:
      button - the button to reset

    • resetListViewAdapter

      public void resetListViewAdapter()
      Resets the ListView adapter to display all items and clears any filter conditions.

    • setDefaultDates

      public void setDefaultDates()
      Sets default dates in the date filter fields when the filter is first activated.

    • resetButtonBackgrounds

      public void resetButtonBackgrounds()
      Resets the backgrounds of all filter buttons to default state.
